```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



```{r include=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
library('brms')
```

Add the data set.


```{r}
dyno <- read_delim('DynamicStim.txt',delim = "\t",
                   col_types = "ffflllllnc")
dyno
```





```{r}
d <- gather(dyno, "Viewer","Response", Viewer_1:Viewer_5)
```




```{r}
m1 <- brm(Response ~ Stimulus + (1|Animal) + (1|Viewer),
          family = bernoulli(),
          data = d)
```




```{r}
conditional_effects(m1)
```

```{r}
hyps <- c("StimulusL - Intercept = 0","StimulusO - Intercept = 0")

hyp <- hypothesis(m1,hyps)
hyp
```


```{r}
plot(hyp, ignore_prior = TRUE)
```
